title: Blended Project-Based Learning Course for Interactive Architectural Design Education

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Conducted in a blended (face-to-face/online) environment with smartphone-centric limited technological infrastructure, emphasizing collaborative dialogic learning based on social constructivism

learning_goals: Achieve 80%+ participation in structured online discussions with peers and instructors to solve architectural design problems.
Revise and finalize design proposals at least three times via 1:1 design critiques (Desk Crits) before submission.
Produce a 1,000-character design improvement report incorporating peer feedback from group design reviews.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
